chapters.title: Chapter 34: Judgment
chapters.info: Bela, p. 537—Tam al'Thor's old packhorse. She is short, shaggy, and quite docile. Egwene rode her out of Emond's Field when she left with Moiraine and Lan. Rand suggested her as a way to take Egwene with them. She was later used by Siuan to leave Tar Valon on their way to Salidar.
